item.title: Kinki Spiritual Affairs Bureau coming to Switch 2 in 2026
item.content:encoded:
• Switch 2

Currently available for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC.

Publisher AMATA Games and developer Noto Muteki will release horror action game Kinki Spiritual Affairs Bureau for Switch 2 in 2026, the companies announced.

Kinki Spiritual Affairs Bureau first launched for PC via Steam on October 4, 2024, followed by PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series on July 15, 2025.

Here is an overview of the game, via AMATA Games:

About

Kinki Spiritual Affairs Bureau is a Japanese-style horror third-person shooter game where you can fight back against the spirits.

This game is not a classic Japanese horror game where you can’t fight back against the spirits. In Kinki Spiritual Affairs Bureau, you’re just as much of a threat as the spirits themselves!

Gameplay Mechanics

  • The main gameplay consists of unarmed combat, gun shooting, and stealth action.
  • There are a total of 10 stages to clear.
  • The game includes plenty of story-driven cutscenes.
  • Four difficulty settings are available, allowing players from beginners to advanced to enjoy the game repeatedly.
  • The button configuration for game controllers can be freely changed, enabling personalized play.
  • As a feature unique to the Nintendo Switch 2 version, the game now supports mouse-like pointer controls using the Joy-Con 2.
